rule:
1. The participants compete for the highestTotal P&Lby providing liquidity on the selected DEXes and chains:
    • DEXes:
      • UniSwap v3
      • KyberSwap Elastic
      • SushiSwap v3
    • Chains:
      • Ethereum
      • Polygon
      • Arbitrum
      • Optimism
  2. Each participant will create a new wallet and send $1,000 USDT to that wallet at the beginning of the competition (Krystal will send $50 to each wallet as gas fee support)
  3. All liquidity positions counted into the participants’ performance must be opened between 12:00PM Nov 20 - to 12:00PM Dec 19, UTC.
  4. Participants can only open and close their LP positions in full. Adding liquidity or removing partial liquidity of an existing position are not allowed as it will reset the P&L tracking to zero.
  5. On Dec 19, 12:00PM UTC, Krystal will take a snapshot of all participants’ P&L to identify the winners
  • TheTotal P&Lwill be calculated as the sum of both open and closed positions. Example:

    • This wallet has $7.34M P&L for all open positions

    • It also has -$21.99M P&L for all closed positions

    • So, itsTotal P&Lis-$14.65M
